lines.i: Complications associated with the administration of a medication

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.107"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11218)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10473)/@code="67541-3" Medication complication NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10474)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD (CONF:10475), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MedicationComplication 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.45 DYNAMIC (CONF:10476)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.08
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11218)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10473)/@code="67541-3" Medication complication NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10474)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD (CONF:10475), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MedicationComplication 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.45 DYNAMIC (CONF:10476)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.08
